package assignment1;

public class Marksof3sub {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		/*
		 * Assignment 3: Marks of Three Subjects
Objective: Practice using integer variables.
Question:
Write a Java program that:
Stores marks of three subjects in int variables
Stores pass/fail status in a boolean variable
Prints all values on separate lines
Expected Output (example):
Subject 1 Marks: 75
Subject 2 Marks: 68
Subject 3 Marks: 82
Result: true
Concepts used:
int, boolean, variables, output
		 */
	int sub1=75;
	int sub2=62;
	int sub3=83;
	boolean result=true;
	System.out.println("subject 1  marks :" + sub1);
	System.out.println("subject 2  marks :" + sub2);
	System.out.println("subject 3  marks :" + sub3);
	System.out.println("Result =" +result);

		
		
		
	}


}
